attributes.action: Pay nothing to the EU without certified accounts for all our years membership.
attributes.background: Without our being able to ascertain how much the EU have defrauded the UK of, no 'exit fee' can be accepted or payed. The EU must provide certified accounts for all our years membership.

rejection.details:
We are not sure what you are asking the Government to do. The EU already publishes annual accounts. You can find out more here:

http://ec.europa.eu/budget/explained/reports_control/annual_rep/ann_rep_en.cfm
